rule.name: SH_VM_TasksReport
rule.description: This is an interface to define how the report will look
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!statusFilter: null, local!taskStatuses: { "Assigned", "Accepted", "Completed", "Not Started", "Cancelled", "Paused", "Unattended", "Aborted", "Cancelled By Exception", "Submitted", "Running", "Error" }, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"( label: "Status", placeholder: "Pick a status", choiceLabels: { "Assigned", "Accepted", "Completed", "Not Started" }, choiceValues: enumerate(4), value: local!statusFilter, saveInto: local!statusFilter ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v1"( label: "My Tasks", instructions: "A list of all tasks for the current user", labelPosition: "ABOVE", data: a!queryProcessAnalytics( report: #"_a-0000e6dc-9616-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_39656", query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( pagingInfo: fv!pagingInfo, filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "c5", operator: "=", value: local!statusFilter, applyWhen: not(isnull(local!statusFilter)) ) ) ), columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Name", sortField: "c0", /*value: fv!row.c0,*/ value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_processTaskLink"(label: fv!row.c0, task: fv!identifier) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Process", sortField: "c3", value: fv!row.c3 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Status", sortField: "c5", value: fv!row.c5 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Deadline", sortField: "c7", value: fv!row.c7 ) }, rowHeader: 1 ) } ) )
